ctx: intros net net' Hstate Hpackets Hreachable.

original: intros net net' Hstate Hpackets Hreachable. induction Hreachable. - apply RIR_init. - apply RIR_step_failure with (failed := failed) (out := out). -- apply IHHreachable. -- eapply step_failure_ind; eauto. - apply RIR_handleInput with (h := h) (inp := inp) (out := out) (d := d) (l := l). -- apply IHHreachable. -- rewrite <- Hstate. eauto. -- intros h'. rewrite Hstate. eauto. -- intros p H. assert (In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h l)). { apply H2. eauto. } destruct H3; [left|right]; apply Hpackets; auto. - apply RIR_handleMessage with (p := p) (xs := xs) (ys := ys). -- apply IHHreachable. -- eauto. -- intros h'. rewrite Hstate. eauto. -- intros p' H'. assert (In p' (xs ++ ys) \/ In p' (send_packets (pDst p) l)). { apply H4. eauto. } destruct H5; [left|right]; apply Hpackets; eauto. - apply RIR_doLeader with (st' := st') (ps' := ps') (h := h) (os := os). -- apply IHHreachable. -- rewrite <- Hstate. eauto. -- intros h'. rewrite Hstate. eauto. -- intros p H'. assert (In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)). { apply H4. eauto. } destruct H5; [left|right]; apply Hpackets; eauto. - apply RIR_doGenericServer with (st' := st') (ps' := ps') (os := os). -- apply IHHreachable. -- rewrite <- Hstate. eauto. -- intros h'. rewrite Hstate. eauto. -- intros p H'. assert (In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)). { apply H4. eauto. } destruct H5; [left|right]; apply Hpackets; eauto.
